functions.name: calculate_variable_cost_for_year
functions.description: Calculate the variable cost for a given year

cases.body: -(( ((utility_price + material_price) * plant_output_kg_per_year + inflated_othervar) * inflation_price_increase_factor * percnt_var * start_time ) + ( (utility_price + material_price) * plant_output_kg_per_year * inflation_price_increase_factor * (1 - start_time) ))

functions.name: prices_from_df
functions.description: For a given year (i), return a list containing the price of each material

functions.name: get_variable_cost_column
functions.lambda_map_arg_str: year, sum_list(prices_from_df(utility_price_df, i)), sum_list(prices_from_df(nonenergy_material_price_df, i)), inflation_price_increase_factor, plant_output_kg_per_year, percnt_var, start_time, inflated_othervar
